name: Brie Puffs
author: Chef DJ
summary: If you liked baked cheese, then you'll love this little easy-to-make snack. Low-carb and ketogenic friendly.
ingredients: 1 ¾ ounces Brie cheese, rind removed
directions: Line a microwave-safe plate with parchment paper
Working in batches if necessary, place a few cubes onto the prepared plate, spacing them about 1 1/2 inches apart
Microwave on high until cheese cubes begin to puff up, 1 to 2 minutes, watching to be sure they do not burn
Cheese will appear to melt at first, but then it will puff up
Sprinkle paprika over cheese puffs and allow to cool before serving
